properties.Name: IssueRelationshipType
properties.Description:
A classification or categorization of relationships that may exist between Issues.

Ex:
- Common service requests
- Common organization practices
- Common services
- Common Quality Issues
- Common Production Issues
- Common Vendor/Supplier Issue
- Common Inventory Issue

Columns.Name: IssueRelationshipTypeId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Issue Relationship Type.

Columns.Name: IssueRelationshipTypeName
Columns.Description: The name of a Issue Relationship Type.

Columns.Name: IssueRelationshipTypeDescription
Columns.Description: The description of a Issue Relationship Type.
